title: See You in August--Posthumous Gabriel Garcia Marquez
description:
Considered one of the most significant authors of the 20th century, he was awarded the 1972 Neustadt International Prize for Literature and the 1982 Nobel Prize in Literature.

He is best known for his works 100 Years of Solitude and Love in the Time of Cholera. 

After his death in 2014, reports circulated about a posthumous volume of unpublished stories. One of those stories, "Nos vemos en agosto" was published on the Internet. 

Here, for the first time, is the translation of that story. 

Epub  and pdf formats.

Leaked from a famous New York literary magazine?
